howToPlay: Each round you are presented with a Russian word and a set of four options, only one of which is the correct meaning for the word shown. Select the correct word to move on to the next word. If you get a word wrong, it's game over and you have to start from scratch. The game lasts until the entire database ({{wordCount}}) is exhausted.
answerViaKeyboard: You can also answer using the number keys on your keyboard
youLost: There's still room for improvement in your vocabulary. Try again?
